message: I would like to go on the record, I don't care if you are gay, straight, trans, or any of the 50 other new things that a person can apparently be these days. Its none of my business, I don't want to tell you how to live any more than I want you to tell me how to live, but there is the problem your movement is trying to dictate how I , and more importantly, my children live. If I find a man in the bathroom with my daughter I can not guarantee they will be walking back out, not a threat just a fathers natural response to my child being in danger. Also I don't walk around advertising the particulars of my sex life, neither should you. If you try to force your agenda on my children I will resist you, and if you choose to go to War against the rights of those who choose to live as nature intended I will go to War.

It's not your business until the property you pay for is over run by rats.... which is just one of the many vermin high grass attracts. Or its not your business until you go to sell your home and can't even get what you owe on it, regardless of how much hard work and effort you put into it... because of your perfectly capable but lazy neighbor's lack of maintenance lowers the value.
